title: Hilton
extract: The word Hilton or Hylton is a place name of English and Norwegian origin, which is also the source of a toponymic surname . ... Sometimes Hilton is found as a given name.
extract_html: The word Hilton or Hylton is a place name of English and Norwegian origin, which is also the source of a toponymic surname . ... Sometimes Hilton is found as a given name.
